alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:06AM PST until February 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph on Wednesday. * WHERE...The Inland Empire above 2000 feet. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers are most likely for Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Snow could locally fall as low as 1500 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
